original_title: Blink-182: Album Launch (The Making Of Blink-182)
overview: A documentary covering the recording sessions for the 2003 Blink-182 Album. The album was primarily recorded in a house rented out from a family. They had to move to several other studios for the remainder of the recording, once the family requested the house back. Also the band managed to pull of a mini tour during the recording process (The Dolla' Bill Tour). The Album Barely Made its release "Window" with recording wrapping up days passed its deadline.
tagline: Blink-182 Blink-182 Album Launch The Making Of
title: Blink-182: Album Launch (The Making Of Blink-182)
